original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ caranti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ tiroraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam caranti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ carissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ tiroraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam carissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ carantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ tiroraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam caranti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ carissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ tiroraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam carissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikā cārikam careyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: yassa vijite viharati, taṁ ṭhapetvā aññassa raṭṭhe.
analyzed: yassa vijite viharati tam ṭhapetvā aññassa raṭṭhe

original: tasmiṁ magge corānaṁ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
analyzed: tasmin magge corānam niviṭṭha ukāsaḥ dissati bhutta ukāsaḥ dissati ṭhita ukāsaḥ dissati nisinna ukāsaḥ dissati nipanna ukāsaḥ dissati

original: tasmiṁ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
analyzed: tasmin magge corehi manussāḥ hatāḥ dissanti viluttāḥ dissanti ākoṭitāḥ dissanti

original: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kukkuṭa sampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa
